author: Jonathan Klingberg
comment: I love it! Works really well on my moto360 along with Nexus 5 and Strava. It helps me keep up the pace during my long runs. Could be easier to adjust the speed during running ex. in down- vs uphill long runs. Might also some more levels of vibrations with longer and shorter ones.

reply.author: ABonEntendeur
reply.content: Thank you for you feedbacks. No promises but you have good ideas.
